page.title: 03A Day In Grampound School
page.content: I come to school at ten past eight. I put my bag on my peg, get the football out and then play in the playground. At nine o'clock the bell is rung. We start by doing reading work and mental arithmetic while the register is taken and numbers for dinners worked out. At 9.15 we have assembly. This is when the whole school joins together for a short service.We work till 10.30 because that is when we go out to play. Playtime lasts for 15 minutes. After play we usually do language work or creative writing.At 12.00 it is lunch time,some people go home but most stay at school.Some people bring sandwiches others have cooked lunch.Lunch time ends at 1.00.We go in and get ready for P.E.We usually do rounders or races.For the last part of the day we have geography or science or history.We go home at 3.30.
